name: Descent 3
description:
EXE versión para Intel HD o superior 
Wine 32bit
Nivel: Gold (Solo funciona con nGLide bajo Wine)
notes: Una vez instalado Wine (4 o superior) y sus componentes instale el  juego manualmente desde el menú conceptual > Run EXE inside wine prefix.
content:
files:
- nglide:
    filename: nGlide_setup.exe
    url: http://www.zeus-software.com/downloads/nglide/d-1.html
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Games/Descent 3/Descent 3.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
  working_dir: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Games/Descent 3/
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    args: /S
    description: Installing nGlide...
    executable: nglide
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
system:
  reset_desktop: true
  resolution: 640x480
